text: @realDonaldTrump USPS is one of the largest employers of veterans. 60% of those vets have a disability rating. They’re fighting on the front lines of the COVID-19 battle & now fighting for their jobs. Call Congress and tell them SAVE OUR SERVICE! https://t.co/yhcIXCaxq7
